verses.text: \w Now|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w men|strong="H3478"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*, saying, “\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* marriage \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* Benjamite.”

\w So|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H1008"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, lifting \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w voices|strong="H6963"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1065"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H1419"\w*.

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w cried|strong="H3478"\w* \w out|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w happened|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w missing|strong="H6485"\w*!”

\w The|strong="H1129"\w* \w next|strong="H4283"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w got|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* presented \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* asked, “\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*?” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H5927"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w solemn|strong="H7621"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* grieved \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H3117"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Benjamites, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w cut|strong="H1438"\w* \w off|strong="H1438"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w about|strong="H6213"\w* wives \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w survivors|strong="H3498"\w*, since \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w by|strong="H7650"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* marriage?”

\w So|strong="H5927"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* asked, “\w Which|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w*?” \w And|strong="H3478"\w*, \w in|strong="H3478"\w* fact, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3427"\w* \w when|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w counted|strong="H6485"\w*, none \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6485"\w* \w residents|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* 12,000 \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* most \w valiant|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*: “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*, \w including|strong="H6310"\w* women \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*: \w Devote|strong="H2763"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w destruction|strong="H2763"\w* \f + \fr 21:11 \ft Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering.\f* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* female \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H1697"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w relations|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2145"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* four \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w women|strong="H1330"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3045"\w* \w relations|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2145"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* brought \w them|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* message \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Benjamites \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Benjamites \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* women \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* \w spared|strong="H2421"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*. \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w were|strong="H1144"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w enough|strong="H4672"\w* women \w for|strong="H6256"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* grieved \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* void \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* said, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w about|strong="H6213"\w* wives \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w remain|strong="H3498"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w women|strong="H2205"\w* \w of|strong="H2205"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* been \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*?”

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* added, “There \w must|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* heirs \w for|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w survivors|strong="H6413"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w wiped|strong="H4229"\w* \w out|strong="H4229"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* wives.” \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w*, “Cursed \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Benjamite|strong="H1121"\w*.”

“\w But|strong="H2009"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3117"\w* said, “\w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* road \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w goes|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lebonah|strong="H3829"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6680"\w* they \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* Benjamites: “\w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, hide \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6680"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*

\w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w watch|strong="H7200"\w*. \w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* perform \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w dances|strong="H4246"\w*, each \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, \w catch|strong="H2414"\w* \w for|strong="H3318"\w* himself \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* fathers \w or|strong="H3808"\w* brothers \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w complain|strong="H7378"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* tell \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, ‘Do \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w favor|strong="H2603"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* helping \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* wives \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w each|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*. \w Since|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* actually \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* daughters, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* guilt.’”

\w The|strong="H5375"\w* Benjamites \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* instructed \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* women \w they|strong="H3651"\w* needed \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* dancers \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w caught|strong="H1497"\w*. \w They|strong="H3651"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* own \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3478"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; everyone \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H3477"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.
